author: markt
msg: Have JspC initialize its ClassLoader before the ServletContext.
This avoids the need to re-initialize the ClassLoader for every JSP being pre-compiled.
This also fixes https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=57316 by removing the code that was causing the bug.
